website_summaries.verdict: Though its power can't top Dyson's full-sized vacuums, it has a lot to offer and is easy to use. The affordable price and versatility make it a top value from the brand.
pros: One of Dyson's most versatile and affordable models, thanks to its lightweight design that can be used as a stick or handheld vacuum
Offers excellent power for its class
Brush roll is easy to clean
cons: The suction isn't quite as good as larger Dysons, and the battery requires charging after about 20 minutes of use

website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight stick vacuum that converts easily to a handheld and works on all floor types.
pros: Direct drive head is durable and provides reliable cleaning action
Great for carpet but is specially effective on hard floors
Snap on extra parts easily for a full customized house cleanse
Dirt bin is very easy to empty without making a mess
cons: Simple to charge, but battery life may not last as long as other models

customer_reviews.title: Complete disappointment - very poor service
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment, I have this device for about 3 weeks, it stopped working after 2 times of use only! The Dyson support is a joke, it takes them forever to respond and after 3 weeks of emails now they asked me to take the device to a service center. I don't have the time to deal with this anymore. returning the device to Amazon. this is not the level of product and service I expected form Dyson...and from $300 product.
customer_reviews.author: YA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: 4/4/18 UPDATE: At the beginning I thought it was an ok overpriced vacuum, now its not even that. Vacuum has VERY WEAK suction, all hoses are clear and unclogged and still the suction is not even enough to pick up bread crumbs from the ground. I'm very disappointed in this "suppose to be" high quality vacuum. I empty the canister regularly after each use, charge it after every use but still it doesn't work as should be, I always have to go over with my big Shark vacuum. It's a waste of time using it. I'll post a video shortly how weak the suction is. Not worth it, don't spend all this money for this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: markus

customer_reviews.title: Battery Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I like everthing about the Dyson Vacume, but i don't like the fact I can only Vacume on high suction for less than 10min!! Make a freaking better battery, it's not that hard!! I called Dyson customer service the other day and the girl told i have to keep my vacume on low suction in order to get the 30min, and if i have it on high suction it only goes 10min. 😞 I can't believe the so called best Vacume in the world only has a battery that runs for 10min!! Even on low pressure it dosent last 30min
customer_reviews.author: Chris r.

customer_reviews.title: No, just no.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t spent you hundreds of dollars on this crap. A $69.00 drill has replaceable battery options so you can keep working. A $19.99 dustbuster has an on off switch. This has none of those simple things. I used to have a major crush on Mr. Dyson. Now, I am so sick of having to recharge when trying to get a room done I’d divorce the the bastard if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very weak suction. Battery does not even last 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Anand

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Battery is toooo short, and it doesn't work even I used only three times.
customer_reviews.author: young10

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. I was nervous since it was "used-acceptable ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I was nervous since it was "used-acceptable " But the price was significantly lower than new. It's in excellent condition and with full warranty. Would do amazon warehouse again. Vacuum works great cans with all original parts and packaging. Very light vacuum, good suction
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Probably better out there for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really good suction but product description says it lasts up to 1 hour but it doesn't last more that 10-15 min. Also you have to hold down a power button the whole time you're using it. I really don't like that feature for the money you're spending. It's 2017. Put an on/off button on the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Best price around
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently purchased our "forever home" & were finding our little $20 vac a hassle. Chasing the cord. Saw a Dyson salesperson in Costco & fell in love with this vac, but price checked on Amazon... it was $30 cheaper. Even the sales guy said, "that's a good price - get it!" So we did. Love it. Since purchasing we've convinced my mother in law & brother to buy one. Both have larger homes so they opted for the larger model, but everyone is in love! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: good suction with reliability issue
customer_reviews.text: Little over a month of light usage, the power button start intermittently chocking the engine on and off (during constant pressing). It happened within a first 5 minute of usage (after full cycle of charge). The problem seems to be cured by switching between high/max suction button. Good suction, but not that good reliability. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Poddoubnyi

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last more than a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dyson v7 cordless in May 2018 and had problems the battery within a few months. Customer service will do nothing for me and says the warranty is for manufacturing defects, what ever those are and would not even know how to prove. They make you wait a very long time on phone, probably hoping you will hang up. I might as well have thrown $300 in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Utz, Technology Coordinator

customer_reviews.title: I AM IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this vacuum!!! It has set me free from being burdened with a cord!!!! Free at last! I was able to pick up months worth of nasty stuff that our other vacuum didn’t in just one setting. It’s very quiet, light and easy to use. I was able to vacuum my whole house (mostly carpet) twice and part of the couch under the cushions before it died. It looks like a beautiful piece of art hanging in my kitchen, of course because it’s a beautiful shade of pink ( my favorite color) 😊 I would highly recommend this vacuum!!! I have always been impressed with Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Nelff

customer_reviews.title: good vacuum, kind of pricey
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this vacuum because of the price, I really considered the Shark, but when I tried to buy the Shark the company wouldn't ship it to Hawaii!! So they lost my sales and I'm glad I got the Dyson instead, because not only did they ship it to Hawaii, it works really well especially the ball swivel head on the floor nozzle. You can get into anywhere and the suction is great! The bin emptying method is kind of messy, make sure you put the machine inside the rubbish can before opening it, otherwise you'll get fine dust all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: only4me

customer_reviews.title: The worst customer service ever....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner for my mother for Mother’s Day this past May. By November the battery was dead. Three times, dyson sent the wrong battery for replacement. While each customer rep is cordial and apologetic, they still send out the wrong battery again. This is ridiculous. My mother is 73 year’s old and has had to send back 2 batteries so far. This last one is sitting on her dining room table while she waits for the FOURTH BATTERY to arrive with the return label for the third battery. If this fourth battery is yet again incorrect, then I will have to do a chargeback through my credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny house so the battery life (which is about 15 minutes on the stronger setting) is not an issue. But this thing is amazing. I noted what another reviewed did and before I donated my old vacuum I ran it around the house. Then I used the new one and pulled up a gross amount more dirt and dust that was left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November and it stopped working in March. Called Dyson and found out there is no warranty because I bought on Amazon through a third party vendor. The lithium battery needs to be replaced for $100.00. I used the wall mount that came with the product and when it is wall mounted, it is continuously charging. Dyson said the product can not charge continuously because it ruins the battery. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: renato skerlj

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good to just OK- not fully sold
customer_reviews.text: A relative has the V11 Animal which I thought was a great product so, I purchased this one as a less expensive alternative (also since I don’t have animals). I’m not overly impressed when comparing the two- this one shifts around dirt on hardwood floors in lieu of picking it up, but on carpet I have no complaints. Well one- the motorized bottom portion (spinning wheel) tends to get stuck on thicker carpet- and I’m talking not that thick- nothing crazy. It just seems cheaply made for the price. Also the touchless dispenser is great, but you have to really slam it down to close the latch, unless you want to touch it (defeating its purpose).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job on dust on bare floors
customer_reviews.text: It's light, relatively quiet (if high pitched) and extremely convenient to pick up and carry around. It does a good job on dust on bare floors, but for chunks like guinea pig dropping and bits of hay, it's barely on par with the $25 chain store vacuum it replaced. It also chokes on carpets.
customer_reviews.author: V. Holen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed and will never buy another Dyson product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this very expensive cordless Dyson based on the fact that there was suppose to be greater improvement on battery life over their other cordless models. Supposedly up to 30 minutes of power. Well that was a lie. I've had this product for one month and have yet to get more than 6-7 minutes of vacuum life. Then it takes several hours to recharge. It takes me over 2 hours to vacuuming less than 700 square feet of carpet. I'm very disappointed and will never buy another Dyson product. I would not recommend this vacuum to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dyson Powerless

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product came defective and then when I want to return it it cost a fortune to ship it back costing me way too much for junk. Don't buy it..... We got it left it charge over night and when we tried to use it i just keeps turning on and off over and over then just dies. tried to charge it again and same thing happened the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Walls

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This has literally changed my life in that I can keep the house easily clean without dragging a huge heavy vacuum cleaner everywhere. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: No additional accessories other then the original complementary tools
customer_reviews.text: The listing is very confusing. I purshased it and thinking it includes additional accessories because of the product title. Be aware, these accessories are complementary and always includes in the box so you don’t need to pay extra $50 for it. Go to other V7 listings and save the money. Now I have to deal with return and pay for return shippping.....
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: quick kitchen clean up after the kids
customer_reviews.text: battery life is number one problem, only worth a one-star deduction though. function is very good as you would expect from Dyson. If this is your price range and all you need it for is quick little jobs it's probably best out there. Black and Decker one we had broke so I appreciate how sturdy it has been with kids dropping it so much.
customer_reviews.author: DrPRIME

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model, full-size Dyson, and this feels just as powerful. Carpet attachment is great. Battery life is pretty short when using "max" setting, not quite enough time to cover my whole apartment. Standard setting is probably just as effective for most jobs and provides plenty of power time to cover bedrooms, living room rug, hard-wood floors, baseboards and get all the little nooks and crannies. Love the power, simple design and easy storage. The brush attachment on the extender is perfect for blinds and baseboards!
customer_reviews.author: PRH96

customer_reviews.title: My kids love using this!
customer_reviews.text: My ex-husband has this exact one at his house and my two boys (ages 11 and 16) LOVE it. They said if I got one they would "vacuum all the time" and "Mom, you'll never have to vacuum because we will do it all." So far, so good! The second the package arrived (One Full Week Before expected!!!!!!!!!) the boys ripped the package open (rather violently because they are boys), assembled the thing and started vacuuming. I love the wall mount feature. Anything that gets my kids cleaning is a good investment in my own personal happiness so Thank You Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ann D

customer_reviews.title: We like this unit but we are very disappointed in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We like this unit but we are very disappointed in the charge time of the battery. I does not hold a charge for 30 minutes as advertised. My wife and house cleaner want me to return it. Do you have any suggestions? They might be happy with a spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Was very skeptical about paying this much for a vacuum, but Money well spent, we love it. Very powerful and extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this stick vacuum I loved it. However after only 4 months, the battery died. I called and was told that a one time only replacement will be sent to my house. That was two weeks ago. I called again last week and was told it would be coming. I still haven't received it. My daughter has the same vacuum and hers broke three times! So much for the Dyson name!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this as we have many dyson products we love. This device stopped working after just two uses. Will not turn on. Contacted the seller who would not offer even an exchange of product because it was past the “30 day warranty” they offer. Told us we had to contact dyson. Dyson says their 1- warranty that is advertised on this posting does not apply to second party sellers. We paid over 200 dollars and have nothing to show for it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K.

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy one sooner?
customer_reviews.text: We've always had a normal cheap vacuum that worked fine. Never realized how bad "fine" is until I got this thing. Best vacuum I've ever used. It makes vacuuming feel much less like a chore because its so much easier now. Just grab it off the charging stand, vacuum the spot you need, and hang it back up. The one weak spot I have found is when using the floor brush attachment (normal vacuuming) larger objects on the ground don't fit very well and won't get sucked up (think popcorn or jelly bean size).
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Dyson online support
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does an excellent job on floors particularly My excellent rating is based on the manufacturer's better- than "excellent" response to a dead battery problem after about 8 months of use. I contacted their Chat room on July 4 (holiday), not expecting much help, only to find the most helpful and cordial response I have ever experienced from any vendor in the past. The Dyson employee (working from home) was knowlegable, and very friendly and accomodated all of my questions and took care of my battery (sending me a replacement at NO charge) Dyson should give lessons on meaningful "customer care" !!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Beard

customer_reviews.title: No more sweeping.  Removes everything in a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I have a home and a cabin with hard surface floors and a dog. This vacuum seems expensive but it works so well picking up dog hair, dust, small pebbles, virtually everything with one quick pass and no chord to mess with. Even cleans the grooves in the wood floors. You will be amazed at how much more you can remove from your floors with this vacuum in a fraction of the time. Very easy to empty and no bags to change. I actually enjoy using it. It only works on hard surfaces and very short pile rugs. I will have to buy another one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: john ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself in January after getting tired of hauling my regular vacuum up and down the stairs. Even though I get my corded vacuum out now and again, this makes quick of fast touch ups when company is coming or you spill something dry in the kitchen. (Great for spiders too) Only wish the battery would last a bit longer between charges.
customer_reviews.author: EJG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Boy did I need this thing and I didn't even know it, cleaning any kind of surface is 10x easier now. I recently unpacked a box that was full of Styrofoam, and I didn't sweat it because I had this thing to clean it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than previous models
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model of the Dyson stick vacuum and hated it. If there was anything larger than a grain of sand on the floor the vacuum wouldn’t get it. And I have cats which means kitty litter and crumbs from their food on the floor. I hesitated to buy this model, but I’m glad I did. It picks up litter, cat chow, hair, dust and everything that winds up under my husband’s chair during dinner. It charges fast and so far it’s worked at max suction for 20 minutes or so. I really need a cordless stick vacuum for in between major cleaning and this is the most versatile one I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It’s AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Definitely if you have a house with a pet or more than 2 rooms don’t hesitate to buy the more expensive one. But if you’re like me and have minimal animal traffick and tight on storage and have a smaller hardwood floor it’s perfect!!! I love it!!! I find myself using it to vacuum in hard to reach spots that I could never clean before. You find new ways to use it within hours of having it. 20 minute of my house cleaning was cut due to its easy waste deposite lightness of it and ready to use charging station. But wish it came in different color schemes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ortega

customer_reviews.title: The Dyson Vacuum Will Change Your Life.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum literally changed my life. There are a few products that come along that literally change your life. The IPhone is one of them and the Dyson vacuum is on that same elite list. Light weight. Cordless. Amazing suction. This vacuum is truly revolutionary. The only critique I would add is 30 minutes of operating time between charges is too little. The reason being, you will literally not want to stop vacuuming once you start. You will become a vacuuming addict. It's that good. It's pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Sztyndor

customer_reviews.title: Great Dyson with the exception of...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews of this Dyson V7 so I will make this to the point. Amazing power suction and battery life. My old similar dyson is nothing compared to this beast! That being said the mechanism that opens the dust collection bin is hard and messy to use and seems flimsy. I am really enjoying using the v7 just hope it doesn't break!
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great compliment to your vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dyson v7 Motorhead two days ago. After charging it, I did some quick vacuuming of our rug by the back door that is constantly dirty from the dog tracking in dirt and mud from outside. It worked well. It was easy to maneuver. The next day I used it to vacuum the stairs. Again, it did amazing. And it was easy to empty when I was finished. This is a great cordless vacuum for quick cleanups around the house. It is not a replacement for a larger vacuum but a perfect compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessamyn Rock

customer_reviews.title: Companion to having a dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a shorthaired dog and hardwood floors, plus a few rugs. This vacuum is perfect for out two bedroom home. It doesn’t last more than ten minutes of left on the max setting, but I can get all my vacuuming done on the standard suction that lasts about a half hour. It’s lightweight and so easy to navigate behind the chair, under the bed, and anywhere I need to clean, plus I already used it on the window sills.
customer_reviews.author: Nate James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rechargeable Dyson for my boat. It picks up everything. Easy to use, very light weight, compact enough to store on the boat. Came with a great hanger so I can hang it in a closet when not using. Can’t imagine what I did before I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Mom knows best

customer_reviews.title: but I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd fall for a vacuum cleaner, but here I am writing a review for this product. Only had it about 2 weeks so I can't speak to durability yet, but I love this vacuum. It is perfect for cleaning up a couple times of week -- so easy to run quickly over the kitchen floor or quickly vacuum the carpet. Lightweight, easy to empty. My house is cleaner bcs it is so easy to quickly vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My first Dyson. I’m impressed. Bought it to do stairs and light duty kitchen clean up on all wood floors. Suction is excellent and the machine feels like your gliding on floors. Best feature is how the vacuum swivels in tight turns with effortless motion. Other reviewers didn’t like the fact the you have to keep your finger on the power switch. I disagree. The push button works naturally and it stretches the battery cycle. The attachments are easy to clip. Ideal for use as second vacuum for quick cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market...
customer_reviews.text: I really love Dyson products. In my opinion, they are the best around. I’ve been using Dyson since they were first introduced in this country and I will never try anything else. There is no need because Dyson lasts forever. The suction on this one is incredible. It’s as good as a full size vacuum. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug1113

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This little vac is powerful, easy to maneuver, not too loud,convenient! A game changer for a multi-level home: some carpet on stairs, throw rugs, wool room area carpets, think pile accent rugs, laminate, furniture, tile, kids, kittens! Best used as a charge for downstairs and recharge for upstairs. This is because we prefer the turbo setting. Battery could last if in lower setting mode longer. We did our research and highly recommend this little vac.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has good suction. My big complaint is the battery life. The optional components that come with this vacuum are handy. I think that Dyson should have interchangeable batteries. Simply replace the battery that runs out of power with a fresh one. Something for the next version.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. CARLSON

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday, set it up, charged it as required and used it this morning. I'm impressed. In fact the only issue I had with it is they wall mount has a spring in the base to hold the unit in place & the spring is a little weak so it doesn't click into place. Still charges fine, I used a small bungy cord to hold it in place. When I called their toll free number the representative was VERY kind and they are sending out a replacement for that bracket ... took all of three minutes. I only wonder why more companies can't be like this! Find Job Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Verigam

customer_reviews.title: ... vacuum for a couple of weeks now and I love it! I use it on hard wood
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this vacuum for a couple of weeks now and I love it! I use it on hard wood, carpet, and rugs. It works great on all 3. The short battery life isn't an issue for me because I am able to get my entire first floor done in about 10 to 15 minutes. I was worried that the trigger power button would be annoying, but it has been a very natural transition and the vacuum is very light weight so it hasn't bothered me at all.
customer_reviews.author: ELS123

customer_reviews.title: It didn't meet my expectations; overall, it is fine - gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The cordless freedom is amazing, but I was disappointed in the functionality of the product because 1) you have to continually hold the button down in order for the vacuum to stay on and 2) the battery life lasted ~15 minutes, which granted, I was using the max airflow that the guide forewarned would drain the battery quicker but 15 minutes?! Having to continuously hold the button down makes my hand cramp after awhile. Emptying the filter is very easy, so that's a plus. Overall, I like this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this vacuum. It is so lightweight and I find myself using the different attachments for cleaning different things. I love the smaller attacchement to use it like a Dustbuster. I can zoom around my tiny house very fast and get all the floors on one battery. Using the more powerful settings definitely makes the batt die faster but it is good to use for carpets. I wish I could buy everyone this vacuum, it’s so amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Picks up well using max suction. Tradeoff is max suction only gets you about 10 minutes battery time at full charge. I haven't tried lower suction option. They claim you should get about 30 minutes at full charge. Convenient storage hanger rack mounts easily on wall using supplied anchors. Charge time is 3.5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tinari

customer_reviews.title: Didnt even last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a month and a half. Bought this January 7th. Used it for 2 minutes today and it turned off after being charged overnight. Charged it for another 3 hours and it still doesn't work. I've heard horror stories of people trying to get help from Dyson. But I can't return it so it's my only option. You would think a $250 dollar vacuum cleaner would last at least 2 months...
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hausenfleck

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS DYSON CORD FREE VAC
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson Cord Free Vacuum. This one is so improved since my first purchase five years ago: lighter, more powerful suction, more colorful, attachments and empty procedure much streamlined. Did I say FUN TO USE, Y E S!!
customer_reviews.author: doc2

customer_reviews.title: Really Sucks, Really!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love, yes again. This gem was well thought out. Great with dog shedding, rugs and the stuff that accumulate on them and hard flooring. May not have the battery capacity to do a full room that's fully carpeted. Light aluminium tube makes cleaning ceilings at arms length easy. Sweeper head fits in spaces I used to pass over with other rechargeable type vacuums. Suction couldn't be better, if it clogs it stops to prevent motor burnout. I do wish it had a battery charge status indicator tho. The light it has is inadequate. The wall hanger is ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is just what I was looking for! It is perfect for a quick clean for crumbs on the floor after wiping down kitchen counters or for keeping dog hair around the house to a minimum. I love that it can be coverted to a hand held to vacuum stairs or the sofa. It’s also great that it can get under furniture. This won’t replace my corded Shark vacuum as I can’t get through the whole house on one charge, and a corded vacuum works best on carpets covered in Lab hair. But it’s perfect to have on the main floor for simple, daily use.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dyson!! I have a bigger Dyson that I use for the carpet’s and deep cleaning but this cordless does wonders for a quick cleanup’s on hardwoods, bathroom floors and surface cleaning on carpet. The tools make cleaning the vents so simple and it’s so lightweight. You will NOT be disappointed ! Don’t expect it to do a great job on thicker carpet, it’s not meant for that!
customer_reviews.author: nook1201

customer_reviews.title: Only 10 months old & wont turn on
customer_reviews.text: This is less that a year, and suddenly not working. I take it apart regularly to clean out, & keep on charging cord. Tried to get thru to customer service 3 x today. They have no live agents, and are mor interested in getting personal info, instead of helping to troubleshoot/ fix. Going on a week of this not working & if I need to buy a new vacuum, it will NOT be an expensive dyson. Have heard great things about the shark vacuum lately (better than dyson in head to head contest). This was a splurge & extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I debated about buying one of these for years and I do not regret my decision. When I bought, we were living in a small one bedroom hardwood floor apartment. It was absolutely perfect for this, especially with two cats and all the fur and litter. Now living in a house I was worried it would run out of battery but does the job just perfectly. Great to just grab and go when you see little messes around the house or for a full deep clean. Surprisingly very good on carpets. If you have animals in the house, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Dyson vacuum but not our first Dyson product. My wife has wanted this pink one forever but I didn't think it would do as good of a job as it does. We have half hardwood floors and half low pile carpet. It does really really well on the carpets. I'm very impressed the amount of dust that came out of them. It does ok on the hardwood floors I think getting the soft roller brush would do a better job on them but it does get the dirt up. Overall all I would definitely recommend one of these
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rozwadowski

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I read the mixed reviews and took a chance, really glad i did. I am so impressed with this little vac. Soooo much better than my previous traditional, bulky, corded vac. Easy to store, easy to clean, picks up all the stuff even though it seems like it shouldn't be able to! Works great on all my floors: linoleum, carpet, and area rug. Also, contrary to what everyone says, the trigger button actually doesn't bother me, i kinda like it. So far i am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: k-flo

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. The house is much cleaner now because everyone just picks this thing up and vacuums a little with it. No getting the old big heavy thing out of the closet dragging it around and finding a place to plug it in. Duspn is light, it’s easy, it gets the dog and cat hair off of the rugs, and gets the dirt off the floors. Easy to empty. I show it to friends and they go out and get one and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer in our house with 3 cats and 1 dog. We have to clean the floors EVERY day to avoid having fur and cat litter all over the place. (Yes, it really does pick up kitty litter when in Max Suction mode!) The ease of use and convenience of this machine is perfect for doing a quick run through my 1200 square foot house daily to keep on top of it. It's easy to quickly swap out different cleaning heads when needing to reach up and get cobwebs and things as well.
customer_reviews.author: nashvillebookworm

customer_reviews.title: Everything I'd hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I've always HATED dragging the vacuum out, pulling it around, replugging into outlets. This little gem solves all those problems. So easy to use, lightweight, easy to put onto the charger, tiny to store, simple and clean to empty. It has plenty of suction (I've had it for over six months and wanted to wait to write a review). I vacuum heavily trafficked areas so much more often now because it takes just a minute to do the entry or hallways. A dream come true!!!
customer_reviews.author: N Morris

customer_reviews.title: Broken product, terrible support
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived broken at my house, with a non-functional charging port, part of the main body of the vacuum. Dyson support has been incredibly unhelpful. They have shipped multiple replacement parts (for the cable, then the handle) that were not related to the problem I've complained about. Rather than offering to replace the non-functional vacuum they have just wasted my time by asking a bunch of unhelpful questions and trying to dodge the question of replacement. It seems like they are doing their best to avoid honoring the warranty, which I thought was disappointing given the price point on the product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Copulsky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a daily value from Amazon. Got a real Dyson for %40 off. I was beyond happy. Then it arrived and I fell in love! It’s as good as the hype. I needed this and wouldn’t have spent the money on it had it. It been sale priced so low. I’m so glad I got it. It is so much nicer than cheaper vacuums. And I use vacuums at home a lot. Pets and hardwood floors and stairs and allergies oh my. This thing is great. A splurge and investment I consider wise now.
customer_reviews.author: Susann

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this if u plan to vaccum a room bigger then 20x20...battery not adequate
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent for quick vaccum of areas that have been messed after ur regular vaccuming with a big vaccum. Too bad battery is not detachable like a drill motor or such some tool so that one can replace it while the dead one charges...Dyson should consider that. Some other vaccum people have and it looks just like dyson. I have had our old larger cord vaccum for a thousand years and it still works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum cleaner. Its perfect for quick clean up, my 5 year old is able to pull it out of its socket and clean up with it. Not too heavy. We did have a battery problem in less than 6 months of purchase, and had to request a battery replacement. They did not have batteries (backordered!) but Dyson was very good about it and replaced with a new vacuum itself. Happy with the vacuum and service.
customer_reviews.author: shruti

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This if You Have Pets that Shed!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and it's convenient, and for quick pickups I'm happy. But, I have 2 dogs that shed and this vacuum is CONSTANTLY getting clogged up. Then you have to go in with a screwdriver or something else to unjam all the hair that's stuck in about 4 places. After over a year I just discovered yet another one when all the usual places didn't work last week. Good for picking up standard dust and things, but not for things like wood pellets which it does NOT like.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Arkuszewski

customer_reviews.title: Battery needed to be replaced after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum, but can't recommend it. The battery failed after just 6 months and Dyson charges approx. $80 dollars to ship out a replacement. I did everything I was supposed to do - stored it correctly and cleaned the filter regularly. Seems like a big rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery power
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a 10' X 12' room. Dyson should send all customers who own this product, a more powerful battery. Right now, you are lucky if you get 30 minutes battery power on standard ("high suction speed"). On "max power" the battery does not hold up even for 10 minutes. The exhaust fan is blowing on your body while in operation, which I felt uncomfortable. Material quality and user-friendliness, etc., are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew John

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, quality, extras
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has a good amount of pressure at its high setting for about 20 minutes. It works great for hardwood floors and shorter length carpet. It was washable canisters. The unit breaks apart in to a hand-held an so offers two crevice tools. I really like this whole unit. I’m glad I paid just a little more for quality. It wasn’t much more than the no name versus the quality I have come to know in Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: nikki baker

customer_reviews.title: Dyson, you done good!
customer_reviews.text: My wife still insists on doing her own housework even though getting rather frail. Our old Dyson was rather heavy so I bought her this one because it is lighter and easier to use. She just loves it. It is as powerful as our old Dyson and maybe even more powerful. It mounted easily in our pantry and stays charged. It removes a surprising amount of cat hair from rugs and furniture. Dyson, you done good!
customer_reviews.author: T. Drymon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely loving this sweeper! So quiet (which was a major perk because my 3.5 year old is afraid of my old sweeper because it's so loud.), lightweight, long lasting battery, and works great on hardwood floors ( I have only 1 room in my house that has carpet and that's the livingroom.)! I definitely recommend this sweeper! Another plus was I got it a lot cheaper through Amazon warehouse and they said there were imperfections but I didn't see any :) I never thought I'd think a sweeper was pretty but this one definitely is lol
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davis

customer_reviews.title: BEST. INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.text: BEST. INVESTMENT. EVER!!!! I cant believe that I didn't buy one of these before! I love that the vacuum is so light weight and small in size. All I'm saying is that my floors are almost always clean because it's not such a chore to take out the old heavy vacuum anymore. Love that I can vacuum my stairs in about 2 minutes using the shorter attachment. Suction on the vacuum is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Skotsen

customer_reviews.title: Best vac I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The person who should write this review is my best friend. I was so thrilled with this vac, I showed it to her. She ordered one the next day, and I'm convinced the woman has lost her mind over it. As her daughter says, it's all she talks about. Needless to say, we both LOVE our motorhead. its maneuverable. It cleans so thoroughly. It's so lightweight and well-balanced, it doesn't put a strain on my back and I don't feel like I've wrestled w/a grizzly after I vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Horrible dust canister design.
customer_reviews.text: Worst design ever for a dust canister. Be ready for what you just vacuumed up to fly everywhere when you empty it. The good news is with the short run time the battery gives you it will have less in it.
customer_reviews.author: uno1

customer_reviews.title: Battery died in 11 months; mail in your warranty card
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after less than a year. Luckily I had mailed in the warranty card so customer service mailed out a free replacement battery. For $280 I expected a longer lasting machine. Maybe the new battery will do the trick. I do keep it constantly charges using the wall attachment charger that comes with it, I bet that’s not the best thing for any electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. Very light and compact
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Very light and compact. Makes vacuuming very easy. The filter is small so most likely you will have to clean it sooner than regular vacuumings. The only reason I won't give 5 stars it's because of the length the battery before having to charge. It lasts 30 minutes before you having to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not for picking up anything but very small dust like particles...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the right vacuum for you if you have toddlers who drop food on the ground. You need the Dyson Absolute that has the head that can pick up larger pieces of debris. I was so frustrated trying to vacuum even a Cheerio because this just pushed it around. Returned this after three days.
customer_reviews.author: H34J

customer_reviews.title: What's all the fuss about?
customer_reviews.text: Meh...whatever. It's really not better than a vacuum that is much cheaper. Maybe the Dysons are made with organic plastic and assembled by third-world children who also receive an educational program, or free t-shirts, or a fire escape plan from their bamboo buildings, or free pot stickers for lunch. I like pot stickers. Cordless is nice, but I'm not drawn to offer a cap-in-hand moment of silence when I use the Dyson. Great marketing, but if all you want is a clean floor...
customer_reviews.author: scott beal

customer_reviews.title: Light, portable, two suction settings...you'll vacuum evetything
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Bought it for my daughter. Then myself. Then for two others. My dog sheds and this vacuum is the answer. It works well on the area rugs, the couches... I even vacuum fur off of my comforter and couch pillows. I've use it to vacuum my car, the garage entry rug. It's light and powerful (2 suction settings- the lower setting works best for the comforter). My only caveat is that on my hardwood floors, it can leave streak marks from the rotating brush (the marks wipe away but makes for more work). I think there is a hardwood floor attachment but i haven't looked into it.
customer_reviews.author: Sbp

customer_reviews.title: This works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I got this to supplement my dc41 as it was tough lugging the beast upstairs. What I discovered is this is now my go to vacuum. Works awesome on hardwood but more importantly for me is it does a great job on my orientals without the too-heavy suction of the animal. Battery life is very good as I use low power almost exclusively. On the negative, the brush attachment is worthless. The bin emptying is very good, no hands. I have a German shepherd so I have to empty to bin after every use.
customer_reviews.author: JStauf

customer_reviews.title: Once you own a Dyson you will never purchase any other brand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vac! Everyone i know has one and really when you have lots of wood floors and area rugs, long haired white cats and dad who drops crumbs everywhere you just need to be able to whip this stick vac out and suck the crud up fast!!! It is quiet and i can vac the entire house and not run out of a charge (it is wireless so no cords trailing around). You must get a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: jen burn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Only received 2 days ago but am seriously in love. I work full time, have to small children and a dog which seems to shed a small puppy every other day. I need something efficient and powerful to keep up with all the Cheerios, hair, dirt and debris and so far this has exceeded my expectations. It works well on wood floors and on my carpeted stairs. The 30 min run time is plenty for the high traffic areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ejm1108

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum for the price. Wife loves it..so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stylios T.

customer_reviews.title: shoot button got stuck, does not work after 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Sept, by Oct it was not working, the shoot button got stuck, plus the battery just lasts 10 min on max it truly was a wate of money, I was so looking forward for it to work well... I contacted the warranty deparment and they are going to change the machine, I will update as soon as I get the new product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: SO AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is like no other. It's suction power is incomparable and picks up every single dirt particle, dust, or hair on your floors. It's not extremely loud like some other vacuums and the battery lasts forever. I'm able to vacuum my whole home without the battery dying on me which is amazing. This product is a bit more expensive but is definitely worth the splurge. I've had my vacuum for years and it's still perfectly fine. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a dyson retailer!!!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself was great...while it lasted. Don’t make the same mistake I did and get it from an authorized retailer, though. When mine stopped working I contacted dyson who informed me that the serial number was a fake. Stopped working after 10 months and dyson did nothing to help me. Amazon also did not care. Waste of $300. I have since purchased one straight from dyson (with a 2 year warranty) and the difference is night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense.
customer_reviews.text: I resisted getting a Dyson for a long time because of the expense, but after spending an equivalent amount of money on Hoovers and Bissels that were awful, I finally broke down and got this, and now I understand why they are more expensive. It is very well designed, light, quiet, and has MUCH better suction than the cheaper copies. This thing gets used several times a day on cat litter and has proven to be effective and durable. It has a peculiar emptying method but other than that is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RobertaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were way too expensive but finally bit the bullet after several recommendations. Holy cow, I'd have paid twice as much. Well worth it and is no hassle to use for easy quick cleanups. House stays way cleaner after several months of use I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Brakes two month after warranty runs out
customer_reviews.text: The connections to the bin that needs to be emptied are very delicate and gets jammed A LOT. Finally it got jammed where I can't pull it apart without breaking. You can't mail this product for repair. Period. The only shop that is many miles away is closed. Over the phone "help" was more concerned with registering my personal information rather than providing useful assistance. It's garbage now. For this price range Im sure there are much more durable products. Im super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Torres

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It was so hard for me to use my old upright vacuum due to it being so heavy and hard to maneuver. My daughter has one of these and encouraged me to get one. Well it was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made! So lightweight and easy to handle from the ease of pushing it...to emptying the container. It’s very powerful as well for a deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed with this V7 model
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to teplace a 4 year old V6 motorhead. Very dissapointed by the lack of suction and shorter battery life than the the older V6. We returned it and will look for another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Dust all over again
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened the box yesterday and the bin for the trash doesn’t open unless I take it off myself. It’s suppose to open when u pull/ push I believe but nope. It was so messy when taking the dust out. Did AMAZON sent me old item? May be I should have bought it directly from DYSON? Doesn’t the job but but when taking the dust out it gets messy again. Lil disappointed
customer_reviews.author: rox

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. I have two kids and have to constantly vacuum the floor. this has been a life changer. I had the Shark Cord free before and starting getting wrist problems as the top was very heavy. I don't seem to have this problem with Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok this vacuum is the best purchase ive made all quarantine. Absolutely amazing, changed my life. Just one thing, wherever it came from the vacuum and the box and all the parts have mold smell, and after weeks the vacuum still smells like that, like humid and mold. Ugh i wish i wouldve gotten a vacuum that smelled fresh new
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy Vacuum Cleaner, But Watch Out For The Battery..
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson vacuum cleaner is great since its very light and cordless. It came in handy since i didn't have to plug it in after moving to a different section of my house. However after having it for a few months, the red light started blinking on the battery and it stopped charging. It turned out that I had to pay $80 for a battery replacement from Dyson, which is so overpriced. I'm a bit disappointed that the battery stopped working so fast from such an expensive vacuum cleaner. So do weigh out the pros and cons when buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Li

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I bought this to help with upkeep and so I didn’t have to lug my ball dyson up and down my stairs all the time. It works very well. I have mostly hard wood and it works very well on that. I have four dogs, two German Shepherds that shed a lot so dog hair is always a problem in my house. Very light weight and easy to use. I even used it to clean my car out and it did an amazing job. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for small areas as second vacuum NOT as the only one for mid-big houses
customer_reviews.text: Very light, design is great, very practical, quiet BUT it is good as a second vacuum cleaner, maybe if you have small apartment, no kids no animal, this might work. For a mid-big house you will need a stronger vaccum cleaner. You will need to run in MAX power more often than you think, battery will die so quick in max power that you get frustrated having to charge for next about 3h to get it back. For cars is excellent, easy, light and does the job but dont think it can be your only vaccum if you have bigger house, kids, carpet and hardwood, still can work as fancy broom but the broom doesn’t stop in 8 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Hrodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Basically life changing
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a wedding gift and it's made keeping things clean SO much easier! It's easy to assemble and figure out how to use. I will admit that I rarely was the one doing the vacuuming since it involved lugging out the big old vacuum and tugging it around the house. This zippy little guy actually makes it fun to clean! Bonus that it's magenta! Only thing I would warn is to keep in mind that one must keep their finger on the "trigger" in order for it to work. For that reason, I could see how this may not be the best choice for people with compromised hand dexterity. Otherwise, this is an excellent investment.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

product_meta.title: Dyson V7 Motorhead Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Fuchsia (227591-01)
product_meta.description: The Dyson V7 Moorhead cord-free vacuum has 75 percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cord-free vacuum. Engineered for all floor types, the direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. The Dyson V7 Moorhead cord-free vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean UPS, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places. Cleans hard floors with extra power for carpets. With 2 additional tools. Up to 30 minutes of powerful fade-free suction. Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning. The direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles deep into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. It has 75Percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cord-free vacuum. Transforms to a handheld for beyond the floor cleaning. Hygienic dirt ejector empties dust from the bin in a single action. 2 tier radial tm cyclones - 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture fine dust. Max power mode provides up to 6 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks. Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between. All Dyson cordless vacuums quickly convert to a handheld for quick clean UPS, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places. Convenient docking station stores and charges the machine, and holds additional attachments. So it's always ready to go. Dyson received the highest numerical score among stick vacuums in the J.D. Power 2017 Vacuum Satisfaction Study, based on 6,965 total responses from 7 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a stick vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-March 2017. Your experiences may vary. Do not use to pick up flammable or combustible liquids, such as gasoline, or use in areas where they or their vapors may be present. Suction power is up to 100AW.
feature_bullets: Cord free; Hassle free; Powerful suction
Up to 30 minute's run time when using a non-motorized tool. Detachable battery: Non-detachable
Lightweight and versatile, for easy home cleaning. Instant release trigger means battery power is only used while it’s cleaning; Requires charging for 3.5 hours minimum before first use
Direct drive cleaner head; Up to 6 minutes of fade free power (in Max mode); Drives stiff nylon bristles into carpets to capture deep down dirt
Powered by the Dyson digital motor V7 and engineered to pick up ground in dirt and fine dust from hard floors and carpets
75 percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cordless vacuum
Hygienic bin emptying: No need to touch the dirt. Bin volume 0.14 gallons
Quickly transforms to a handheld vacuum, to clean all around your home and car

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,573 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
